variables.description:
The contrast ratio to reach against white, to determine if color changes from "light" to "dark".
Acceptable values for WCAG 2.0 are 3, 4.5 and 7.
Default dark color for WCAG 2.0.

context.name: wcag-dark
context.value: black

variables.description: Default light color for WCAG 2.0.

context.name: wcag-light
context.value: white

variables.description:
The color white.
Note: you cannot change this value.

context.name: kendo-color-white
context.value: #ffffff

variables.description:
The color black.
Note: you cannot change this value.

The color transparent.
Note: you cannot change this value.

A gradient that goes from transparent to black.
Note: you cannot change this value.

context.name: kendo-gradient-transparent-to-black
context.value: rgba(black, 0), black

variables.description:
A gradient that goes from transparent to white.
Note: you cannot change this value.

context.name: kendo-gradient-transparent-to-white
context.value: rgba(white, 0), white

variables.description:
A gradient that goes from black to transparent.
Note: you cannot change this value.

context.name: kendo-gradient-black-to-transparent
context.value: black, rgba(black, 0)

variables.description:
A gradient that goes from white to transparent.
Note: you cannot change this value.

context.name: kendo-gradient-white-to-transparent
context.value: white, rgba(white, 0)

variables.description:
A gradient that cycles through the colors of the rainbow.
Note: you cannot change this value.
The global default Colors map.

context.name: kendo-colors
context.value: $_default-colors

usedBy.description:
Takes a color name from the $kendo-colors map as a parameter
and returns a CSS variable with the actual color as a fallback

context.name: k-color

css.description: This is the same as `flex: initial;` and the shorthand for the default value: `flex: 0 1 auto`. It sizes the item based on its `width`/`height` properties (or its content if not set). It makes the flex item inflexible when there is some free space left, but allows it to shrink to its minimum when there is not enough space. The alignment abilities or `auto` margins can be used to align flex items along the main axis.

variables.description:
The contrast ratio to reach against white, to determine if color changes from "light" to "dark".
Acceptable values for WCAG 2.0 are 3, 4.5 and 7.
Default dark color for WCAG 2.0.

context.value: black

variables.description: Default light color for WCAG 2.0.

context.name: wcag-light
context.value: white

context.value: k-map-merge( $_default-font-sizes, $kendo-font-sizes )

variables.resolvedValue: (thin: 100, extra-light: 200, light: 300, normal: 400, medium: 500, semibold: 600, bold: 700)

variables.description: The letter spacings map

context.name: kendo-letter-spacings
context.value: k-map-merge( $_default-letter-spacings, $kendo-letter-spacings )

variables.resolvedValue: (tightest: -0.15px, tighter: -0.1px, tight: -0.5px, normal: 0px, wide: 0.5px, wider: 0.1px, widest: 0.15px)

context.name: kendo-font-families
